name: Aqua Paradise: Boku no Suizokukan
overview: Aqua Paradise Boku no Suizokukan let the player build his own Aqua theme park: Choose the employees, build the different buildings, buy fishes, make researchs, prepare shows with your dolphins, etc. The game features a lot of different kind of fishes to buy, different employees to contract with different stats and also features a 3d view of the animals and fishes.
